Answer: tyl wndaks ka astamal karty hoey btnwn ko astail karnay kay l you ، aap by jy-*، tykst-*، hawwr: by jy-*، hawwr: tykst-*، fwnt bwlda ، paiy-*، py ayks-*، ghwl aur shydaw-*klasza 12 astamal krsktay hayn۔tyl wndaks ka astamal karty hoey astail btnwn kay liye kuch amwmy akdamat yeh hayn: apnay HTML dstawyza main <btn> tygh bnaiyn۔btn ka mtn ۔.hover: bg-* klas ko btn kay ps mnzar ka rngh mrtb karnay kay liye klas kryn۔btn kay mtn ko bwlda bnanay kay liye .font-bold klas shaml kryn۔X-axis pr۔ btn kay kwnay kwnay bnanay kay liay. chhaty wali klas ko shaml kryn۔btn klas = "by jy blw -500 hawwr: by jy blw -700 tykst wait fwnt bwlda py waiy 2 py ayks 4 ghwl shydaw aym day"> btn </btn> is msaal main ، by jy-blw -500klas btn kay ps mnzar ka rngh nylay rngh main rkhta haay۔.HOVER: BG-BLUE-700 klas btn kay ps mnzar ka rngh nylay rngh kay ghharay sayha par syt krta hay jab is par ghhwm jata haay۔.Text-white klas btn kay mtn ka rngh sfyd par syt krty haay۔.font-bold klas btn ka mtn bwlda bnata haay۔.py-2 klas Y- mhawr par btn ki bhrty ko 0.5REM par syt krty haay۔.px-4 klas ayks mhawr par btn ki bhrty ko 1REM par syt krty haay۔.kha hoa klas btn kay kwnay kwnay ko ghwl krta haay۔. shydaw-aym day klas btn main ayk drmyanay saiay ka azuafha krty haay۔ aan lain bohat sary wsail dstyab hain jo tyl wynda sy ays ays ays ays ays ays ays ays ays ays ays ays ays ays ays ays ays ays 2 flw bait 3 byyn bwrghrza ka astamal karty hoey astail btnwn kay liye mrhalha war hadayat aur kwda ki msaalyn fraham karty hayn۔

Question: tyl wnda sy ays main by jy-plsty aur tykst awpnty klaswn ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: tyl wnda sy ays main by jy-apysyty aur tykst awpysty klasza ka astamal kesi ansar kay ps mnzar kay rngh aur mtn kay rngh ki dhndlapn ko baltrtyb 123456 par kabw panay kay liye kya jata haay۔an klaswn kay baray main kuch tfsaylat yeh hayn: by jy awpysty: yeh klas kesi ansar kay ps mnzar kay rngh ki dhndlapn ko kntrwl karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔as ka astamal ps mnzar kay rngh ki dhndlapn ko kesi khasa kdr par ya dhndlapn kay pymanay main byan krdha kesi kdr par syt karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔by jy-apasty klas ko by jy-* klaswn kay sath mil kar astamal kya jaskta hay takha ayk mkhsawsa dhndlapn kay sath ps mnzar ka rngh pyda kya jaskay۔as ka astamal mtn kay rngh ki dhndlapn ko kesi khasa kdr par ya dhndlapn kay pymanay main byan krdha kesi kdr par syt karnay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔tykst awpysty klas ko mtn kay sath mil kar astamal kya jaskta haay۔: kesi bhi mwjwdha dhndlapn ki afadyt ka sabkha۔msaal kay tawr par ، MD: BG-opacity-50 sirf drmyanay askryn saiza aur is sy zayada 24.24. main BG-opacity-50 ywtylyty ka atalak krta hay ، tyl wndaks main BG-opacity aur tykst-opacity klas ko ansar kay ps mnzar ki dhndlapn ko kntrwl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔rngh aur mtn ka rngh ، baltrtyb۔an ka astamal dusray klaswn kay sath mil kar astamal kya jaskta hay takha ayk mkhsawsa dhndlapn 123456.1TAILWINDCSS2TAILWINDCSS3TAILWINDCSSS4TAILWINDCSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSS kay sath ayk ps mnzar ka rngh ya mtn ka rngh pyda kya jaskay۔

Question: astail farm un pt kay l you aap tyl wndaks ko kis tarah astamal karain ghay؟
Answer: tyl wnda sy ays ka astamal karty hoey un pt astail karnay kay l you ، aap bardar ، paiy-*، py ayks-*، tykst-*، by jy-*، aur fwks: aaؤt lain nahin klas 123 astamal krsktay hayn۔tyl wyndaks ka astamal karty hoey astail farm un pt kay liye kuch amwmy akdamat yeh hayn: apnay HTML dstawyza main <an pt> tygh bnaiyn۔ un pt main bardar shaml karnay kay liay. bardar klas ko shaml kryn۔ un pt ki bhrty ko syt karnay kay liye .py-* klasY- axis.px-* klas par x- axis par un pt ki bhrty ko trtyb denay kay liay۔an pt ka ps mnzar ka rngh mrtb karnay kay liye klas۔ fwks: fwks par pehlay sy taay shuda khakha ko khtm karnay kay liye aaؤt lain-kwiy bhi klas۔ yahan HTML kwda ki ayk msaal hay jo tyl wnda sy ays ays ka astamal karty hoey farm un pt ko astail krty haay: <an pt taip = "tykst" klas= "bardar PY-2 PX-4 tykst ghray -700 BG-WHITE FOUST: khakha nhayn"> is msaal main ،. bardar klas un pt main ayk srhad ka azuafha krta haay۔.py-2 klas Y- mhawr par un pt ki bhrty ko 0.5REM par mkrr krta haay۔.px-4 klas ayks mhawr par un pt ki bhrty ko 1REM par taay krty haay۔.Text-gray-700 klas un pt kay mtn ka rngh bhwry rngh main taay krta haay۔.bg-sfyd klas un pt kay ps mnzar ka rngh sfyd par taay krty haay۔.focus: aaؤt lain-kwiy bhi klas fwks par pehlay sy taay shuda aaؤt lain ko hata dyta haay۔ bohat sary wsail aan lain dstyab hain jo tyl wynda sy ays ays 123.1 tail wnda sy ays ays ays ays 3 astyk awwr flw ka astamal karty hoey astail farm un pt kay liye mrhalha war hadayat aur kwda ki msaalyn fraham karty hayn۔

Question: wzuahat karain keh tyl wndaks main flyks baks la aaؤt kis tarah kam krta haay۔
Answer:
tyl wnda sy ays ays main ، flyks baks la aaؤt ko ywtylyty klasza ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jata hay jo sy ays ays flyks baks praprtyza ki taakt ka faidha athatay hayn۔flyks baks jwabdha aur mthark trtyb pyda karnay ka ayk lchkdar aur mwsar tarykha fraham krta haay۔yhaan yeh hay keh flyks baks la aaؤt tyl wnda sy ays ays main kis tarah kam krta haay: kntynr: flyks kntynr bnanay kay l you ، aap ko kesi ansar par flyks ywtylyty klas ka atalak karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ dayfalt kay mtaabk ، flyks klas kntynr ko ktaar ki smt aur flyks aaitmza ko tyar krta haay۔ayk hi lain۔ aap azuafy ywtylyty klasza ka astamal karty hoey kntynr kay tarza aml main trmym krsktay hayn: flyks-rw (phalay sy taay shdha): aaitm ayk ktaar main rakhy jatay hayn۔ flyks krnl: aaitmza kalm main rakhy jatay hayn۔ayk sy zayada lainyn۔ flyks-nwrp (phalay sy taay shdha): aaitmza ko ayk hi lain main rhanay par mjbwr kya jata haay۔flyks aatw (phalay sy taay shdha): aaitmza kntynr ko bhrnay kay liye khynchnay par mjbwr hayn۔ flyks -1: aaitmza ko kntynr ko bhrnay kay liye msawy jghha aur khynchnay par mjbwr kya jata haay۔flyks kntynr kay andr anasar par braha rast klasza۔ pehlay sy taay shuda ، flyks aaitmza dstyab jghha ko pُr karnay kay l automatically khud bkhwd phyl jien ghay۔ aap ywtylyty klasza ka astamal karty hoey flyks aaitmza kay tarza aml ko kntrwl krsktay hayn: flyks ghrw: bhrnay kay liye kesi shay ki brahty hui salahayt ki wzuahat krta haaybaky jghha۔ flyks-skrynk: agar zurwry ho tou kesi shay ko skranay ki salahayt ki wzuahat krta haay۔ flyks bys: azuafy jghha tksym hony sy pehlay kesi shay kay abtdaiy saiza ki wzuahat krta haay۔، sylf syntr ، sylf aynda: anfrady aaitm ko kras mhawr kay sath sydh main krta haay۔flyks kntynr kay andr flyks aaitmza ki sydh: aaitmza astart ، aaitmza sntr ، aaitmza kay aakhr myn: kras mhawr kay sath flyks aaitmza ko sydh main krta haay۔mhawr۔ mshtrkha aaghaza ، mwad ka mrkza ، mwad kay aakhr myn: jab kntynr main azuafy jghha ho tou kras mhawr kay sath flyks aaitmza ki lainwn ko sydh main krta haay۔ jwaby flyks baks: tyl wnda sy ays ays aap ko zamha dar afadyt ki klaswn ka astamal karty hoey jwabdha flyks baks la aaؤt bnanay ki ajazat dyta haay۔aap mkhtlf bryk pwaints par mkhtlf tarza aml ki wzuahat karnay kay liye flyks baks ywtylyty klaswn main zamha dar sabkha shaml krsktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr pr: ays aym: flyks-rw ، aym day: flyks krnl ، wghyrha۔ is ki ayk msaal hay jo tyl wnda sy ays ays main flyks baks la aaؤt kay astamal ko zaahar krty haay: HTMLCOPY kwda
flyks aaitm 1
flyks aaitm 2
flyks aaitm 3
is msaal main ، chhwty askrynwn (phalay sy taay shdha) par ، flyks aaitmza ko flyks kwl klas ki wjha sy amwdy tawr par (kalm la aaؤt) astyk kya jaye gha۔drmyanay askrynwn aur is sy upar ki chyzawn par ، aym day ki wjha sy aaitmza ko ayk ktaar (ktaar ki trtyb) main dkhaya jaye gha: flyks-rw klas۔ tyl wnda sy ays ays kay zaryaha fraham krdha flyks baks ywtylyty klaswn ka astamal karty hoey ، aap aasany sy jwabdha aur lchkdar trtyb tshkyl dy saktay hain jo dahal saktay hayn۔mkhtlf askryn saiza aur apnay mkhsawsa dayzaain ki zurwryat ko pora kryn۔

Question: astail tybza kay liye aap tyl wndaks ko kis tarah astamal karain ghay؟
Answer:
tyl wnda sy ays ka astamal karty hoey tybza ko astail karnay kay l we ، hum tyl wnda sy ays aur dyghr wsail kay zaryaha fraham krdha dstyab ajzaaa aur msaalwn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔tyl wnda sy ays ka astamal karty hoey ayk bnyady tybza jzaw bnanay kay akdamat yeh hain ، jesa keh 1 main byan kya gaya haay: tybza kay jzaw kay liye HTML mark ap bnaiyn
    ansar kay sath fharst aaitmza kay sath۔faal tyb aur is kay mwad ko twghl karnay kay liye jawa askrpt ka astamal kryn۔ yahan tybza kay jzaw kay liye HTML mark ap ki ayk msaal hay js main
      ansar ki fharst kay ashya astamal karty hayn:

      is msaal main ، hum nay astail karnay kay liye mndrjha zayl tyl wyndaks klaswn ka astamal kya haay۔tybza: tybza main nechay ki srhad shaml karnay kay liye tybs bardar-by kay l flex flyks kntynr bnanay kay l flex flyks۔ aym by-py ayks pehlay tyb sy marjn kay nechay ko hatanay kay liye tybza main marjn ka hak shaml karnay kay liay۔by jy wait tybza kay ps mnzar ka rngh sfyd par syt karnay kay liye tybza ko un lain blak daat bardar-ayl ، bardar-ty ، aur bardar-aar kay tawr par dasplay karnay kay liye tybza ko tybza main shaml karnay kay liay۔phalay tyb kay upar kwnay۔tybza bwlda۔ hawr: tykst-blyw 800 hawwr par tybza ka tykst rngh tbdyl karnay kay liay۔ faal tyb aur is kay mwad ko twghl karnay kay liye ، hum jawa askrpt aur pwshydha wsaf ka astamal krsktay hayn۔jawa askrpt kwda ki ayk msaal yeh haay: kanst tybza = dstawyza۔ kwkry sylykwral ('. tyb') ؛ kanst tybkwntynts = dstawyza۔ kwiry sylykwral ('. tyb-kantynt') ؛ tybsfwrch ((tyb ، andayks) => {tyb.addventListener ('klk' ، () => {tabs.foreach ((tab) => tab.classlist.remove ('ayktw')) ؛ tab.classlist.add ('ayktw') ؛ tybkwntynts.fwrch ((tybkwntynt) => tabcontent.setAttribute ('pwshydha' ، sch)) ؛ tybkwntynts [andayks]mwadas kay bad hum nay hr tyb main aywnt snnay walon ko shaml kya hay jo faal tyb aur is kay mwad ko twghl krta haay۔jb kesi tyb par klk kya jata hay tou ، hum faal klas ko tamam tybza sy hatatay hain aur isy klyk tyb main shaml karty hayn۔ham nay tyb kay tamam mshmwlat kay l true bhi pwshydha wsaf ko sch smjha aur klyk tyb mwad kay liye isy hata dyn۔

Question: is ki wzuahat karain keh myks-dablyw-ayks ays aur myks-dablyw-ays aym klasza tyl wnda sy ays main kis tarah kam krty hayn۔
Answer:
zayada sy zayada chwraaiy kesi ansar ki zayada sy zayada chwraaiy taay karnay kay liye tyl wnda sy ays main zayada sy zayada dablyw ayks ays aur myks-dablyw-ays aym klas astamal ki jati hayn۔yha hay keh woh kis tarah kam karty hayn: myks-dablyw-ayks ays: yeh klas kesi ansar ki zayada sy zayada chwraaiy 20 rym ya 320px12 par taay krty haay۔yha aam tawr par chhwty askrynwn ya mwbail aalat kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ myks-dablyw-ays aym: yeh klas kesi ansar ki zayada sy zayada chwraaiy 24REM ya 384PX12 par taay krty haay۔yha aam tawr par bray askrynwn ya ghwlyan kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ yeh klas zayada sy zayada W- {saiza} afadyt kay ayk syt ka hasaha hain jo aap ko kesi ansar ki zayada sy zayada chwraaiy ko ayk mkhsawsa saiza 123 par syt karnay ki ajazat dytay hayn۔zayadha sy zayadha-w- {saiza} afadyt 0REM sy 1536px12 tak saiza ki ayk had ka ahaataha krty haay۔ un klaswn ko astamal karnay kay l you ، aap inhain HTML ansar main shaml krsktay hain js ko aap astail karna chahti hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap is tarah ansar main myks-dablyw-ayks ays klas ko shaml krsktay hayn: yeh taay hawgha۔
ansar ki zayada sy zayada chwraaiy 20 rym ya 320px.by un klaswn ka astamal karty hoey ، aap aasany sy kesi ansar ki zayada sy zayada chwraaiy taay krsktay hain aur isy mkhtlf askryn saiza kay liye jwabdha bna saktay hayn۔aap apnay tyl wnda daat kwkwnfgh daat jay ays main dayfalt myks-dablyw {saiza} askyl ko bhi apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bna saktay hayn۔

Question: tyl wndaks main phalw-dablyw 16 aur phalw-aych -9 klaswn ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer:
tyl wnda sy ays main phalw-dablyw -16 aur phalw-aych -9 klasza ka astamal kesi ansar kay phalw tnasb ko taay karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔yhaan woh kis tarah kam karty hayn: phalw-dablyw -16: yeh klas kesi ansar ki chwraaiy 16 aur awnchaiy ko aatw tak mkrr krty hay ، js kay ntyjay main 16: 9 phalw tnasb 12345.aspykt-aych -9 ka ntyjha haay۔ansar 9 aur chwraaiy sy aatw ، js kay ntyjay main 16: 9 phalw tnasb 12345 ka bhi ntyjha nklta haay۔ yeh klasza @tyl wndaks/phalw sy mtalk tnasb plgh un ka hasaha hain ، jo anasar ko ayk mkrrha phalw tnasb 14 denay kay liye ayk kmpwza aybl API fraham krta haay۔plgh un phalwؤn ko shaml krta haay۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap is tarah kay ansar main phalw-dablyw -16 aur phalw-aych -9 klaswn ko shaml krsktay hayn: is sy
ansar ka phalw tnasb 16: 9. 9. kay zaryaha un klaswn ka astamal karty hoey taay hoga ، aap aasany sy kesi ansar ka phalw tnasb mrtb krsktay hain aur isy mkhtlf askryn saiza kay jwab main bna saktay hayn۔aap apnay tyl wnda daat kwkwnfgh daat jay ays main dayfalt phalw tnasb ki akdar ko bhi apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bna saktay hayn۔

Question: twghl aur swich astail karnay kay liye aap tyl wndaks ko kis tarah astamal krsktay hayn؟
Answer: tyl wnda sy ays ka astamal karty hoey twghl aur swich astail karnay kay l we ، hum tyl wnda sy ays aur dyghr wsail kay zaryaha fraham krdha dstyab ajzaaa aur msaalwn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔tyl wynda sy ays ka astamal karty hoey twghl aur swich ajzaaa bnanay kay kuch tarykay yeh hayn: astail chyk baksza aur rydayw btnwn ko swichza 12 kay tawr par @tyl wnda sy ays/farm plgh un ka astamal kryn۔yha plgh un ywtylyty klaswn ka ayk mjmwaha fraham krta hay js ko astail farm anasar kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، bshmwl swichza aur twghl۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap chyk shdha: BG-BLUE-600 klas ka astamal krsktay hain jab is ki janch pratal ki jati hay tou swich kay ps mnzar ka rngh tbdyl karnay kay liay۔aap chyk baks un pt ، ayk lybl ، aur ayk DIV ansar kay sath HTML kwda trtyb dy kar ayk bnyady twghl/swich jzaw tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔as kay bad ، jab aap baltrtyb ghair chyk aur chyk kyay jatay hain tou swich kay ps mnzar kay rngh ko astail karnay kay liye BG-GRAY-200 aur BG-BLUE-500 klas astamal krsktay hayn۔ pehlay sy blt twghl ka astamal karain aur dusray wsail sy ajzaaa ko tbdyl karain ، jesay kwdapyn۔awr tylghrydas 345۔yha wsail mft tyl wndaks twghl aur swich ajzaaa ka ayk mjmwaha fraham karty hain jo aap apnay prwjykts main astamal krsktay hayn۔dstyab ywtylyty klasza aur ajzaaa ka astamal krkay ، aap aasany sy twghl aur astail bna saktay hain aur un ajzaaa ko tbdyl krsktay hain jo kabl kbwl aur kabl rsaiy hayn۔

Question: tyl wndaks main bardar thws aur bardar dayshda klaswn main kya frk haay؟
Answer:
tyl wndaks main bardar thws aur bardar dayshda klasza ka astamal ansar ki srhadwn kay andaza ko kntrwl karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔an kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: bardar thws: yeh klas kesi ansar kay bardar astail ko thws lain 1234 par taay krta haay۔yha tyl wndaks main pehlay sy taay shuda bardar astail hay aur kesi ansar kay ard ghrd thws lain bnanay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔ bardar dayshda: yeh klas kesi ansar kay srhady andaza ko daysh lain 56 par taay krta haay۔as ka astamal kesi ansar kay ard ghrd dayshda lain bnanay kay liye kya jata haay۔ dono klasza tyl wndaks main bardar astail ywtylyty klas ka hasaha hain ، jo ansar kay bardarza 364 kay andaza ko kntrwl karnay kay liye klaswn ka ayk syt fraham krty haay۔bardar astail ywtylyty klas main dyghr klasyn shaml hain jesay bardar daatda ، bardar dabl ، aur bardar koi bhi ، jo mkhtlf bardar astail bnanay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔ un klaswn ko astamal karnay kay l you ، aap inhain HTML ansar main shaml krsktay hain js ki aap chahti hayn۔andazamsaal kay tawr par ، aap bardar thws klas ko is tarah kay ansar main shaml krsktay hayn: is sy bardar astail taay hawgha۔ayk thws lain par
ansar kay۔ un klaswn ka astamal karty hoey ، aap aasany sy kesi ansar ki srhadwn kay andaza ko kntrwl krsktay hain aur apnay wyb safhaat main mkhtlf srhady tarzayn tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔

Question: hawwr par zaahar hony waly astail twl tps main aap tyl wndaks ko kis tarah astamal karain ghay؟
Answer:
astail twl tps kay l that jo tyl wnda sy ays ka astamal karty hoey hawwr par zaahar hawtay hain ، hum tyl wndaks aur dyghr wsail kay zaryaha fraham krdha dstyab ajzaaa aur msaalwn ka astamal krsktay hayn۔tyl wynda sy ays ka astamal karty hoey ayk bnyady twl taip bnanay kay liye yeh akdamat hain ، jesa keh 1 main byan kya gaya haay: twlt aai py kay liye HTML mark ap ko
ansar ka astamal karty hoey ayk nystda ansar kay sath bnaiyn۔awr is ka mwad۔ hawwr par twl tp ko zaahar karnay aur chhpanay kay liye jawa askrpt ka astamal kryn۔ yahan ayk nystda ansar kay sath

Question: tyl wndaks main shydaw-aym day aur shydaw ayl jy klaswn ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: tyl wndaks main shydaw-aym day aur shydaw ayl jy klasza kesi ansar kay baks kay saiay kay saiza aur shdt ko kntrwl karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔yha hay keh woh kis tarah kam karty hayn: shydaw-aym day: yeh klas kesi ansar kay baks ka sayha drmyanay saiza aur shdt 12345 par taay krta haay۔as ka astamal kesi ansar kay ard ghrd ayk ltayf shydaw asar pyda karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ shydaw-ayl jy: yeh klas kesi ansar kay baks ka sayha braay saiza aur shdt 123645 par taay krta haay۔as ka astamal kesi ansar kay ard ghrd zayada wazuha sayha asar pyda karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ dono klasza tyl wndaks main baks shydaw ywtylyty klas ka hasaha hain ، jo ansar 1235 kay baks shydaw ko kntrwl karnay kay liye klaswn ka ayk syt fraham krty haay۔baks shydaw ywtylyty klas main dyghr klasza shaml hain jesay shydaw ays aym ، shydaw ، shydaw-ayks ayl ، aur shydaw -2 ayks ayl ، jo mkhtlf baks shydaw saiza aur shdt ko bnanay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔ un klaswn ko astamal karnay kay l you ، aap inhain is main shaml krsktay hayn۔HTML ansar js ko aap astail karna chahti hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap shydaw-aym day klas ko is tarah ansar main shaml krsktay hayn: is sy baks ka sayha taay hawgha۔ ansar drmyanay saiza aur shdt ka ansar۔ un klaswn ka astamal karty hoey ، aap aasany sy kesi ansar kay baks kay saiay kay saiza aur shdt ko kntrwl krsktay hain aur apnay wyb safhaat main mkhtlf shydaw asarat pyda krsktay hayn۔

Answer:

Question: tyl wndaks main andar lain hawwr aur lain thrw hawwr klaswn main kya frk haay؟
Answer: tyl wndaks main andar lain hawwr aur lain thrw hawwr klasza ko hawwr par kesi ansar ki tykst sjawt ko kntrwl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔yhaan un main kis tarah frk haay: andar lain-hawwr: yeh klas kesi ansar ki mtn ki sjawt ko HOVER1234 par ayk andar lain par taay krta haay۔as ka astamal hawwr asar pyda karnay kay liye kya jata hay jo mtn ki nshandhay krta haay۔as ka astamal hawwr asar pyda karnay kay liye kya jata hay jo mtn kay zaryaay hamlha krta haay۔ dono klasza tyl wndaks main tykst daykwryshn ywtylyty klas ka hasaha hain ، jo ansar 24 ki tykst sjawt ko kntrwl karnay kay liye klaswn ka ayk syt fraham krty haay۔tykst daykwryshn ywtylyty klas main dyghr klasza shaml hain jesay andar lain ، lain thrw ، nw andar lain ، aur andar lain aafsyt ، jo mtn ki sjawt kay mkhtlf astail bnanay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔ un klaswn ko astamal karnay kay l you ، aap inhain HTML ansar main shaml krsktay hayn۔aap astail karna chahti hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap andar lain hawwr klas ko is tarah kay ansar main shaml krsktay hayn: mujhey hover is sy ansar jab is ki shkl di jati haay۔ dstyab tykst daykwryshn ywtylyty klasza ka astamal karty hoey ، aap aasany sy kesi ansar ki tykst sjawt ko kntrwl krsktay hain aur apnay wyb safhaat main mkhtlf tykst sjawt kay andaza tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔

Answer: tyl wndaks main Z-10 klas ansar 123456 kay astyk aardar ko kntrwl karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔yha tyl wnda sy ays main zayda andayks ywtylyty klas ka hasaha hay ، jo ansar 13456 kay astyk aardar ko kntrwl karnay kay liye klaswn ka ayk syt fraham krta haay۔yha kesay kam krta haay: Z-10: yeh klas kesi ansar ki zayda andayks praprty ko 10123456 par taay krty haay۔ is ka astamal ayk kam zayda andayks wylyw waly anasar kay upar mwjwd ansar ko rkhnay kay liye kya jata haay۔ zayda andayks praprty ayk sy ays ays praprty hay jo haayas trtyb ka tayn krta hay js main anasar ayk dusray kay upar sja dyiay jatay hayn۔aaly zayda andayks wylyw waly anasar ko kam zayda andayks wylyw waly anasar kay awpry hasaay par rakha jaye gha۔ Z-10 klas astamal karnay kay l you ، aap isy HTML ansar main shaml krsktay hain js ko aap astail karna chahti hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap Z-10 klas ko is tarah <dayw> ansar main shaml krsktay hayn: <div class = "Z-10"> is ansar ki zayda andayks 10 haay۔> kam zayda andayks wylyw waly anasar kay upar ansar۔ dstyab zayda andayks ywtylyty klaswn ka astamal karty hoey ، aap aasany sy kesi ansar kay astyk aardar ko kntrwl krsktay hain aur apnay wyb safhaat main mkhtlf astykngh aardar tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔

Question: tyl wndaks main dablyw fl aur aych fl klaswn ka mksad kya haay؟
Answer: tyl wndaks main dablyw fl aur aych fl klasza ka astamal kesi ansar ki chwraaiy aur awnchaiy ko apnay waldyn kay 100 ٪ par taay karnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jab tak keh waldyn ki ayk mtayn chwraaiy ya awnchaiy 123 haw۔yhaan woh kis tarah kam karty hayn: dablyw fl: yeh klas kesi ansar ki chwraaiy ko apnay waldyn kay 100 to tak mkrr krta hay ، jab tak keh waldyn ki chwraaiy ki wzuahat ki hogi haw۔as ka astamal is kay waldyn ki pori chwraaiy ko brahanay kay liye kya jata haay۔as ka astamal is kay waldyn ki pori awnchaiy par ayk ansar bnanay kay liye kya jata haay۔ dono klasza tyl wndaks main chwraaiy aur awnchaiy ki afadyt klaswn ka hasaha hain ، jo ansar 142356 ki chwraaiy aur awnchaiy ko kntrwl karnay kay liye klaswn ka ayk syt fraham karty hayn۔chwraaiy aur awnchaiy ki afadyt ki klaswn main dyghr klasza shaml hain jesay W-1/2 ، H-64 ، myks-dablyw-askryn-ayks ayl ، aur myks aych askryn ، jo mkhtlf chwraaiy aur awnchaiy kay shylywn ko bnanay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔yha klas ، aap inhain HTML ansar main shaml krsktay hain js ko aap astail karna chahti hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap is tarah kay ansar main dablyw fl klas ko shaml krsktay hayn: is ansar ki chwraaiy is kay waldyn ki 100 ٪ haay۔ is sy yeh kam hawjaiay gha۔ ansar apnay waldyn ki pori chwraaiy par phyla hoa haay۔ dstyab chwraaiy aur awnchaiy ki afadyt klaswn ka astamal karty hoey ، aap aasany sy kesi ansar ki chwraaiy aur awnchaiy ko kntrwl krsktay hain aur apnay wyb safhaat main mkhtlf chwraaiy aur awnchaiy kay shylywn ko tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔

Question: tyl wnda sy ays main transfarm-jy py yw aur transfarm-kwiy klaswn main kya frk haay؟
Answer:
tyl wnda sy ays main transfarm-jy py yw aur transfarm nahin klas ka astamal ansar ki transfarm praprty 1234 kay haarda wyir aykslryshn ko kntrwl karnay kay liye kya jata haay۔yhaan un main frk haay: transfarm-jy py yw: yeh klas sy py yw 1234 kay bjaiay jy py yw par transfarm ko anjam dy kar ansar ki transfarm praprty kay liye haarda wyir aykslryshn ko kabl bnata haay۔as ka astamal transfarm harkt pzayry ya mntkly ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kya jata haay۔as ka astamal ayk hi ansar par mwjwd tamam tbdylywn ko ayk hi wkt main hatanay kay liye kya jata haay۔ dono klasza tyl wnda sy ays main transfarm ywtylyty klas ka hasaha hain ، jo ansar 1234 ki transfarm praprty ko kntrwl karnay kay liye klaswn ka ayk syt fraham krty haay۔transfarm ywtylyty klas main dyghr klasza shaml hain jesay ghhwmnay ، trjmha ، pymanay aur askw ، jo mkhtlf transfarm astail bnanay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔ un klaswn ko astamal karnay kay l you ، aap inhain HTML ansar main shaml krsktay hain js ko aap astail karna chahti hayn۔msaal kay tawr par ، aap is tarah ansar main transfarm-jy py yw klas ko shaml krsktay hayn: is ansar main haarda wyir aykslryshn kay sath ghhwmay hoey transfarm hawta haay۔ yeh kray gha۔haarda wyir aykslryshn kay sath
